var_value: Datasets documented in detail and recipes for cleaning up and downloading provided in code notebooks.
Model weights in several variants downloadable through HuggingFace

OpenAssistant Conversations is 'a human-generated, human-annotated assistant-style conversation corpus consisting of 161,443 messages distributed across 66,497 conversation trees, in 35 different languages, annotated with 461,292 quality ratings' (preprint)
Separate website provides entry point to comprehensive documentation
